pageTitle: Safe{Wallet} â€” Secure Smart Account Management on Ethereum | Safe
description: Explore Safe, the leading Ethereum multisig wallet for secure and efficient Smart Account management. Experience advanced security and user-friendly features.

caption: across 15+ networks
title: Keep your assets Safe
text: Use the multisig trusted by Vitalik Buterin and leading web3 projects to secure over $100 billion.

items.caption: Individual users
items.title: Secure Your Savings Beyond a Seed Phrase
items.text: Protect your assets with multi-signature security, giving you peace of mind without relying solely on a seed phrase.

items.caption: Organizations
items.title: Manage Assets Together, Securely
items.text: Collaboratively manage your organization's assets with multi-signature approvals, ensuring security and transparency every step of the way.

items.title: Eliminate single points of failure
items.text: Distribute control across multiple owners for enhanced security.

items.title: Simulate and scan transactions
items.text: Transact with confidence with risk scanning and transaction simulation before executing.

items.title: Restore access to your account
items.text: Never lose access to your account. Restore account control easily with secure recovery mechanisms.

title: More features beyond multisigs
text: Safe is more than just secure asset storage. It's your entry point to onchain activities.

items.caption: Trade seamlessly
items.title: Swap like a pro
items.text: with MEV protection and security, ensuring your intent-based transactions will not fail.

items.caption: Optimize
items.title: Batch transactions
items.text: To save gas and to avoid losing time gathering signatures from everyone.

items.caption: Earn
items.title: Stake ETH Securely
items.text: Stake directly from your Safe{Wallet} with robust multisig security.

items.caption: All-in-one
items.title: Explore Safe Apps
items.text: Swapping, staking, NFTs, identity and more. Interact with 200+ apps integrated with Safe.

items.title: Trustless by design
items.text: Your Accounts are secured directly by the blockchain and not by a centralized entity. They do not depend on the Safe{Wallet}'s interface to exist.

items.title: Safe command line interface
items.text: You can interact with your Safe Smart Account directly with code.

items.title: Use with many interfaces
items.text: Portable across different frontends. You can access your Safe Smart Account from other ecosystem apps like Coinshift, Den etc.

title: Get the Latest on Safe{Wallet}
text: Sign up to our updates and be informed about new features, improvements, and special announcements.

title: Create your Smart Account now
text: Still have questions and want to know more about Safe{Wallet}? Watch our demo.
